alert.note: Alert for Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Polk; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 1:20PM CST until January 10 at 7:21AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EST /230 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Bledsoe, Blount, Bradley, Loudon, McMinn, Meigs, Monroe, Polk, Rhea and Roane. * WHEN...Until 330 PM EST /230 PM CST/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 220 PM EST /120 PM CST/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cleveland, Athens, Lenoir City, Dayton, Kingston, Sweetwater, Rockwood, Loudon, Madisonville, Decatur, Benton, Fairview, Etowah, Spring City, Charleston, Midtown, Harriman, Englewood, Vonore and Tellico Plains. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Polk; Rhea; Roane
